de.erichseifert.gral.plots.colors

Class RandomColors

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.erichseifert.gral.plots.colors.AbstractColorMapper<Integer>

        • de.erichseifert.gral.plots.colors.RandomColors
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ColorMapper, Serializable

    public class RandomColors
extends IndexedColorMapper
    Class that generates pseudo-random colors for specified index values.
